alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:28PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calhoun, southeastern Lexington and southeastern Richland Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gaston, or near Cayce, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cayce, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Eastover, SC State Farmer`s Market, Congaree National Park, Sandy Run, Gadsden, Swansea, New Zion, Lexington Acres Pond, Fort Motte, Silver Lake and Dixiana. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 116 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central South Carolina.
